!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-04-05 08:54:11.177
!MESSAGE No editor descriptor for id org.eclipse.mylar.java.ui.editor.MylarCompilationUnitEditor

The problem here is that your editor for .java files is still set to be the Mylar editor id, which is now gone since it was uninstalled.  This is a 3.1-only issue and has been resolved for 3.2.  To fix that do: Window -> Preferences -> General -> Editors -> File Associations, and for .java make the Java Editor (or AJDT) default.  Please reopen if this does not address the problem.
